accuracy.question: How accurate are the virtual try-on results?
accuracy.answer: Our AI creates highly realistic results by understanding body shapes, clothing physics, and lighting. While not 100% perfect, it gives you an excellent preview of how outfits will look.

photoTypes.question: What types of photos work best?
photoTypes.answer: Clear, well-lit photos work best. You can be in any pose, but make sure your body is visible. Photos with good lighting and minimal background clutter give the best results.

dataSafety.question: Is my data safe and private?
dataSafety.answer: Absolutely! Your photos are processed securely and are not stored on our servers. All processing happens through encrypted connections and your images are deleted after processing.

account.question: Do I need to create an account?
account.answer: No account needed! You can start using the virtual try-on feature immediately. Just upload your photos and begin trying on outfits.

rateLimits.question: What if I hit rate limits?
rateLimits.answer: The free tier has limits (15 requests/minute, 1500/day). You can add your own API key in Settings for unlimited usage, or wait for the limits to reset at midnight Pacific Time.
